member.name: T:Windows.Management.Workplace.WorkplaceSettings
member.summary: Enables UWP apps to access select enterprise settings that are managed through group policy or other management services.

member.name: P:Windows.Management.Workplace.WorkplaceSettings.IsMicrosoftAccountOptional
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether an enterprise ID can be used instead of a Microsoft account.
member.returns: **true** if an enterprise ID can be used instead of a Microsoft account; otherwise, **false**.
